name: BeatJumper
description:
A rhythm game where you have to jump and dash to avoid obstacles.

Heavily inspired by Just Shapes & Beats

Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys or WASD
Jump: X or SPACE
Dash: C or SHIFT

Each song corresponds to a level of difficulty.
Song 1 - Easy
Song 2 - Medium
Song 3 - Hard

Music by Jake Currier
